div.p: Nature of injury (NOI) codes, which are part of the Work Injury or Disease Information coding system (CAN/CSA-Z795-96 - R2003).
The CSA code set includes 3 parts: Nature of injury (NOI), body part (BP), side of body (SB).

li.p: SOB - Left Side of Body = L

div.p: The Body Part codes are qualified by the Side of Body codes code system, to be more precise in specifying the location of the injury being coded.
Code set is maintained by the Canadian Standards Association (CSA).
